text: Xiaomi is unveiling the 15 Ultra later this month in China, perhaps on February 26. It will then get a global launch as well, probably at MWC in Barcelona in early March. We've already seen the phone in hands-on images, and today some new renders have leaked showing it in its intriguing two-tone design. These are claimed to be official renders leaked straight from Xiaomi, for what it's worth. The new camera arrangement inside the huge camera bump is clearly visible, as is the Leica co-branding. Xiaomi 15 Ultra leaked renders The front is almost all screen, with quad micro-curves on all sides, and a small hole-punch for the selfie camera up top. The power and volume buttons are on the right side, as you'd expect. The frame is mostly flat, but curves towards the edges. More Xiaomi 15 Ultra leaked renders The Xiaomi 15 Ultra is expected to be powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC. It's rumored to have a 50 MP main camera with a 1-inch type sensor, a 50 MP ultrawide, a 50 MP short-range telephoto, and a 200 MP long-range telephoto using the same sensor popularized by the vivo X100 Ultra and X200 Pro. Xiaomi is unveiling the 15 Ultra later this month in China, perhaps on February 26. It will then get a global launch as well, probably at MWC in Barcelona in early March. We've already seen the phone in hands-on images, and today some new renders have leaked showing it in its intriguing two-tone design.

These are claimed to be official renders leaked straight from Xiaomi, for what it's worth. The new camera arrangement inside the huge camera bump is clearly visible, as is the Leica co-branding.


Xiaomi 15 Ultra leaked renders

The front is almost all screen, with quad micro-curves on all sides, and a small hole-punch for the selfie camera up top. The power and volume buttons are on the right side, as you'd expect. The frame is mostly flat, but curves towards the edges.


More Xiaomi 15 Ultra leaked renders

The Xiaomi 15 Ultra is expected to be powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC. It's rumored to have a 50 MP main camera with a 1-inch type sensor, a 50 MP ultrawide, a 50 MP short-range telephoto, and a 200 MP long-range telephoto using the same sensor popularized by the vivo X100 Ultra and X200 Pro.
